opendial.arch

Class AnytimeProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • opendial.arch.AnytimeProcess
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ForwardPlanner.PlannerProcess, SamplingProcess

    public abstract class AnytimeProcess
extends java.lang.Thread
    Interface for an "anytime" process -- that is, a process that can be interrupted at any time and yield a result.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-04-16 01:43:58 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
